title: Junior Back-end Developer
details: Creating backend and databases from scratch for an IT staffing website as part of a small, dynamic developer team.

title: Software Developer
details: Developing maintainable code for a website used in courses of the second largest university in Finland. The website underwent enhancements to ensure optimal functionality and user experience.

title: Teaching Assistant
details: Supporting university students by providing guidance on programming exercises, and grading exercise and exam submissions for courses 'Programming 1' and 'Databases'.

title: Software Developer / Consultant
details: Developing high-quality tested code in multiple projects using modern web technologies. Projects include the renewal of an entire frontend UI in collaboration with a designer, transforming an outdated website into a modern, user-friendly platform, while adhering to high accessibility standards.

title: Fullstack Developer
details: Developing and maintaining software of an auctioning website attracting over a million visitors in a month. Enhancing user experience while ensuring the platform's reliability in a high-traffic environment.

name: Portfolio
details: Designing and developing a personal portfolio site showcasing web development skills. Built with React using TypeScript and deployed on Render. 100% designed and developed by yours truly.
